ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] New songs!!!
ygData.msgSnippet: It won t stick on charmed NPCs.  Works fine on summoned pets though.
ygData.messageBody:
It won't stick on charmed NPCs. Works fine on summoned pets though.

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Kimes, Dean W. [mailto:dean_kimes@...]
> Sent: Wednesday, April 12, 2000 8:36 AM
> To: 'eqbards@egroups.com'
> Subject: RE: [eqbards] New songs!!!
>
>
> Aaack! Now that's scary, juggling between this and Siren's would be a
> nightmare. Like we don't do enough finger twiddling already.
> It got a big
> *shrug* from me too.
>
> Kit
>
> -----Original Message-----
> From: Reeves, Patrick W [mailto:pwr3@...]
> Sent: Wednesday, April 12, 2000 9:38 AM
> To: 'eqbards@egroups.com'
> Subject: RE: [eqbards] New songs!!!
>
>
> My guess is that this song is designed as a pet buffing song *shrug*
>
> > -----Original Message-----
> > From: Kimes, Dean W. [mailto:dean_kimes@...]
> > Sent: Wednesday, April 12, 2000 8:32 AM
> > To: 'eqbards@egroups.com'
> > Subject: RE: [eqbards] New songs!!!
> >
> >
> > I thought this song was a little odd, but assumed that
> someone made a
> > mistake when posting the info on it. You could never really
> > hope to use
> > this on yourself in a battle and weaving it in with other
> songs isn't
> > possible if it only lasts one tick. Any ideas what they were
> > thinking?
> >
> > Kit
> >
> > -----Original Message-----
> > From: Benjamin Jerrad Segal [mailto:birdman@...]
> > Sent: Wednesday, April 12, 2000 9:23 AM
> > To: 'eqbards@egroups.com'
> > Subject: RE: [eqbards] New songs!!!
> >
> >
> > On Wed, 12 Apr 2000, Garramone, Michael (CCI-Las Vegas) wrote:
> >
> > > so completely un-bardlike. another wasted slot in our
> > spellbook as far as
> > i
> > > can tell.
> >
> > This song appears to be most useful in power-levelling
> > twinks, something I
> > thought Verant wasn't big on. I'm sure it'll get changed
> > somehow soon.
> >
> > Athren Notechaser
> >
